title: buying problem!
body:
hi 
im farhoomand 
recently i buy brand with (4800) ip and it dosent come to my owned champions list 
but i see it in the list of my buying history 
and i cant play with it 
plz help 
thx

replies.body: Hey farhoomand!  There was a short issue recently where some of the unlocks from the store weren't pushing through.  I looked into your account and see that  Brand has been successfully added.  Let me know if otherwise!
